title.narrative: 1.5 NATIONAL ADOLESCENT PLAN & POLICIES

description.narrative: By 2017, the enabling environment including governance system strengthened to protect, inform and empower adolescent boys and girls to claim their rights and provides opportunities for their participation, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017, national policies, legislation, plans, budgets, coordination and monitoring mechanisms are enabling the survival, development, protection and participation rights of children, adolescents, and women, to be fulfilled with equity in all contexts, including humanitarian situations

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017, the enabling environment including governance system strengthened to protect, inform and empower adolescent boys and girlsto claim their rights and provides opportunities for their participation

description.narrative: Over 1,500 adolescents have expressed their opinions and experiences related to health services and practices as feedback to the government through mobile based technology. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: % of Government's budget allocated and spent for adolescents across all NPA sectors

target.value: 2017:Annual budget allocated and spent in accordance with the NPA

actual.value: 2017:The implementation status report is available. The NPA budget document includes budget allocation data from Government, NGOs and CSOs but not the expenditure (refer to the excel document).

title.narrative: Multi-sectoral gender-sensitive coordination mechanism established and implementing the action plan

target.value: 2017:At least 80% of the NFAA implemented by 2017

actual.value: 2017:The implementation status report is available which is collated by the coordination committee.

title.narrative: Multi-sectoral, gender-sensitive NPA on holistic adolescent development costed and approved by NPC

baseline.value: No costed plan available on holistic adolescent development

title.narrative: Existence of gender-sensitive, multisectoral, budgeted adolescent policy/action plan (reflecting sectoral commitments for adolescents)

baseline.value: No costed plan available on holistic adolescent development

actual.value: 2017:Yes. An action plan has been developed by the Government of Nepal with support from UNICEF and other partners.
